verses.text: Why do you boast \w of|strong="H4905"\w* evil, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* mighty man? \w The|strong="H1732"\w* loving devotion \w of|strong="H4905"\w* God endures all day long.
\w Your|strong="H5046"\w* tongue devises destruction \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sharpened razor, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* worker \w of|strong="H1004"\w* deceit.
\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w love|strong="H2617"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* more \w than|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2617"\w*, falsehood more \w than|strong="H3605"\w* speaking truth. Selah

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* love \w every|strong="H6213"\w* \w word|strong="H3956"\w* \w that|strong="H3956"\w* devours, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w deceitful|strong="H7423"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.

\w Surely|strong="H7451"\w* God \w will|strong="H6664"\w* \w bring|strong="H7451"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w* down \w to|strong="H1696"\w* everlasting \w ruin|strong="H7451"\w*; \w He|strong="H1696"\w* \w will|strong="H6664"\w* snatch \w you|strong="H1696"\w* up \w and|strong="H2896"\w* tear \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w away|strong="H7451"\w* \w from|strong="H7451"\w* \w your|strong="H1696"\w* tent; \w He|strong="H1696"\w* \w will|strong="H6664"\w* uproot \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w from|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* land \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* living. Selah

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* righteous \w will|strong="H1697"\w* see \w and|strong="H1697"\w* fear; \w they|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* mock \w the|strong="H3605"\w* evildoer, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“Look \w at|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* \w man|strong="H2416"\w* \w who|strong="H2416"\w* \w did|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H1571"\w* make God \w his|strong="H5422"\w* refuge, \w but|strong="H1571"\w* trusted \w in|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* abundance \w of|strong="H2416"\w* \w his|strong="H5422"\w* wealth \w and|strong="H1571"\w* strengthened himself \w by|strong="H1571"\w* destruction.”

\w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* olive tree flourishing \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* house \w of|strong="H5921"\w* God; \w I|strong="H5921"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* loving devotion \w of|strong="H5921"\w* God forever \w and|strong="H7200"\w* ever.

\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* praise \w You|strong="H7760"\w* forever, \w because|strong="H7230"\w* \w You|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*. \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* wait \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w Your|strong="H7760"\w* name— \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* good— \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* presence \w of|strong="H7230"\w* \w Your|strong="H7760"\w* saints.
